title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, May 13, 2015
description: Airing on Wednesday, May 13, 2015: First up on today's show, we'll talk to Salil Mehra, Professor of Law at Temple University, about why new net neutrality rules may be pushing Verizon into new markets. Plus, do you want to drive for Uber but can't get a car because you have bad credit? No problem, says the ride service company. It's got a finance program for potential Uber drivers with bad credit.
